title: Have I Been Pwned - Overview
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of Have I Been Pwned breaches.

definition.content:
The [Have I Been Pwned](https://haveibeenpwned.com/) provides a personalized view of compromised data based on your email address, domain and other information you've added in Have I Been Pwned.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of Have I Been Pwned breaches.

For more information, see the [Have I Been Pwned](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/have_i_been_pwned/).

**Tips**:
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates the Have I Been Pwned logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
